projects.name: Multivariate Time Series Forecasting for Stock Prices
projects.description: Developed a time series forecasting model using Python and Vector Auto Regression(VAR) to predict Stock Prices for Apple, Microsoft, Netflix, and Google, achieving a forecast accuracy of 92%. Conducted data preprocessing and performed the Augmented Dickey-Fuller (ADF) test, resulting in data stationarity and improving model stability and prediction accuracy by 20%. Utilized data visualization to plot closing price trends, detect seasonal patterns, and provide stock price insights, enhancing prediction accuracy by 15%.

projects.name: Diabetes Prediction Using Machine Learning
projects.description: Achieved 91% accuracy on a dataset of 2700+ entries through model development. Enhanced data quality by 25% through imputation of missing values and encoding categorical variables. Improved model accuracy by 8% with thorough EDA, outlier detection, and data normalization. Achieved 95.4% train accuracy and 90.8% test accuracy using Random Forest Algorithm.

projects.name: Oreo Desktop Voice Assistant
projects.description: Engineered a voice assistant using Python and Microsoft SAPI5, enhancing hands-free interaction and increasing productivity by 30%. Improved functionalities like wikipedia search, email management, and real-time weather updates. Utilized python libraries (pyttsx3, contextlib, numpy, pandas, smtplib) to streamline processes, achieving a 15% reduction in processing time.

projects.name: Digital Mental Health Solution Prototype
projects.description: Designed a mental health prototype website for counselor-individual communication using Live Counselling, and Blogs using Bootstrap and JavaScript in a 2-member team. Implemented intuitive navigation and responsive design, resulting in a 30% increase in user engagement and 25% improvement in conversion rates.

experiences.description: Skills: Machine Learning, Data Analytics, SQL, Python, OOPS. Earned micro-certifications in IT Fundamentals, RDBMS (MySQL), Python Programming, and Data Engineering. Acquired proficiency in logic development, SDLC, agile methodologies, and n-tier architecture.

full_output.name: Anand Prakash Gupta
achievements_and_awards: Secured 2nd place in the Inter-school Debugging Competition, showcasing precision-oriented for details.
Managed a 5-member team in TechVista - CodeX event and also coordinated as the event head, attracting 300+ participants and 10+ industry sponsors.
